title: Spacious 3-Bedroom Family Home in Lavington
description: A beautiful and modern 3-bedroom house located in the serene and upscale neighborhood of Lavington. Features include a large garden, en-suite bathrooms, a modern kitchen, and close proximity to international schools and shopping centers.

reviews.comment: Absolutely stunning property! The garden is a dream, and the location is perfect for families.
Great house, spacious rooms. Minor issue with water pressure, but overall very happy.

title: Modern 2-Bedroom Apartment in Kilimani with City Views
description: Experience urban living in this stylish 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment situated in the heart of Kilimani. Enjoy breathtaking city views from your private balcony and access to state-of-the-art amenities.

reviews.comment: Fantastic city views and a very modern apartment. Love the gym access!

title: Prime Commercial Plot for Sale in Westlands
description: An excellent opportunity to acquire a prime commercial plot in the bustling Westlands business district, ideal for developing offices, retail spaces, or a mixed-use building. Zoned for high-rise development.

title: Charming 4-Bedroom House in Karen with Lush Garden
description: A serene and spacious 4-bedroom family home located in the prestigious Karen neighborhood, boasting a sprawling lush garden, modern interiors, and excellent security. Ideal for families seeking tranquility.

reviews.comment: An absolute gem! The garden is magnificent.

title: Executive 1-Bedroom Apartment in Upper Hill
description: Perfect for urban professionals, this sleek 1-bedroom apartment offers unparalleled city views from Upper Hill. Features include a modern open-plan kitchen, gym, and proximity to CBD.

title: Agricultural Land for Sale in Isinya, Kajiado
description: Expansive 10-acre agricultural land suitable for farming or future development. Located in Isinya, Kajiado County, with good road access and reliable water sources. Great investment opportunity.

title: Newly Built 3-Bedroom Townhouse in Syokimau
description: Contemporary 3-bedroom townhouse in a gated community in Syokimau. Features spacious living areas, modern finishes, and easy access to Mombasa Road and SGR station.

title: Studio Apartment for Rent in Kilimani (Investment Opportunity)
description: Compact and modern studio apartment in a sought-after Kilimani location, ideal for single occupants or as a rental investment. Close to amenities, public transport, and entertainment spots.

reviews.comment: Great starter home or rental unit. Very convenient location.

title: Commercial Building for Sale in CBD, Nairobi
description: Multi-story commercial building with retail and office spaces available for sale in Nairobi's Central Business District. High foot traffic area, ideal for various business ventures.

title: Spacious 5-Bedroom Villa in Runda
description: An exquisite 5-bedroom villa nestled in the tranquil Runda area, offering expansive living spaces, a private swimming pool, and manicured gardens. Ultimate luxury living.

reviews.comment: Absolutely stunning! A true dream home.

title: Affordable 2-Bedroom Apartment in Thika
description: A pocket-friendly 2-bedroom apartment ideal for young families or first-time homeowners in Thika. Conveniently located near amenities and transport links.

title: Vacant Half-Acre Plot in Limuru
description: A prime half-acre plot available in the scenic and rapidly developing area of Limuru. Ideal for building a dream home or for future subdivision. Great views of the landscape.

title: Luxurious 4-Bedroom Duplex in Kileleshwa
description: A magnificent 4-bedroom duplex offering opulent living in the heart of Kileleshwa. Features high-end finishes, spacious balconies, and exclusive amenities for residents.

title: Residential Plot in Malindi Near Beach
description: A prime residential plot of 1/8th acre in Malindi, a short walk from the pristine beaches. Ideal for building a holiday home or guesthouse. Growing tourist area.

reviews.comment: Perfect location for a vacation spot!

title: Modern 3-Bedroom Bungalow in Kitengela
description: A spacious and modern 3-bedroom bungalow situated in a peaceful part of Kitengela. Features include a private compound, ample parking, and easy access to local amenities.

reviews.comment: Good value for money. Quiet neighborhood.

title: Prime 1/4 Acre Commercial Plot in Ruiru
description: Excellent opportunity to acquire a 1/4 acre commercial plot along the busy Thika Superhighway in Ruiru. High visibility and foot traffic, perfect for retail or industrial development.

title: Cozy 2-Bedroom Apartment in Rongai
description: An inviting 2-bedroom apartment in a secure complex in Rongai. Features include a spacious living room, balconies, and proximity to schools and shopping centers.

title: Large Industrial Warehouse in Athi River
description: Massive industrial warehouse space in Athi River, ideal for manufacturing, storage, or logistics. Features high ceilings, loading docks, and ample parking for heavy vehicles.

title: Seaside 3-Bedroom Cottage in Diani
description: Escape to this charming 3-bedroom seaside cottage in Diani, just steps from the white sandy beach. Perfect as a holiday home or a lucrative Airbnb investment.

reviews.comment: An amazing beach getaway! Loved every moment.

title: Serviced Office Space in Westlands
description: Premium serviced office spaces available for lease in a modern building in Westlands. Fully furnished with high-speed internet, meeting rooms, and receptionist services. Flexible terms.

title: Prime 5-Acre Land in Naivasha
description: Scenic 5-acre land in Naivasha, perfect for a country home, resort development, or agricultural venture. Close proximity to Lake Naivasha and tourist attractions.

title: Compact 2-Bedroom House in Ruaka
description: A quaint 2-bedroom house in a secure gated community in Ruaka, offering affordable living with easy access to Gigiri and Westlands.

title: Prime 1/8 Acre Residential Plot in Ngong
description: An ideal 1/8 acre residential plot in Ngong, perfect for building a family home. Located in a developed area with utilities readily available. Growing suburban feel.

title: Boutique Hotel for Sale in Watamu
description: A charming boutique hotel with 10 rooms, restaurant, and pool, located just off the beach in Watamu. Fully operational with excellent reviews, ideal for investors.

reviews.comment: A fantastic business opportunity in a beautiful location.

title: Spacious 3-Bedroom Apartment in Thindigua
description: A well-maintained 3-bedroom apartment in a serene part of Thindigua, offering ample space and natural light. Close to Quickmart and bypass for easy commuting.

title: Half-Acre Residential Plot in Membley
description: A well-located half-acre residential plot in the established Membley Estate, ideal for building a large family home. Secure and quiet neighborhood.

title: Riverside 4-Bedroom House in Rosslyn
description: A stunning 4-bedroom house with serene river views in the exclusive Rosslyn estate. Features include a spacious patio, mature garden, and proximity to diplomatic institutions.

reviews.comment: Absolutely breathtaking views and a lovely home.

title: Bedsitter Apartment in Roysambu
description: An affordable and well-maintained bedsitter apartment in Roysambu, ideal for students or single professionals. Close to USIU-Africa and Thika Road Mall.

title: Prime 1-Acre Land in Limuru for Development
description: Strategic 1-acre land parcel in Limuru, ideal for a private residence, small gated community, or agricultural venture. Serene environment with good access.

title: Family-Friendly 3-Bedroom Apartment in Loresho
description: A spacious 3-bedroom apartment perfect for a family, located in the quiet and leafy Loresho area. Features include a large living room, modern kitchen, and access to communal gardens.

title: Commercial Plot in Mombasa CBD
description: A valuable commercial plot in the heart of Mombasa CBD, ideal for retail shops, offices, or mixed-use development. High visibility and strategic location.

title: Contemporary 5-Bedroom House in Muthaiga
description: An architectural masterpiece: a 5-bedroom contemporary house in the exclusive Muthaiga suburb. Features include smart home technology, infinity pool, and expansive grounds.

title: Renovated 2-Bedroom Apartment in Langata
description: A recently renovated 2-bedroom apartment in a quiet part of Langata. Features modern fittings, spacious bedrooms, and easy access to shopping malls and national park.

title: Plot for Sale in Athi River (Residential)
description: An affordable 1/8th acre residential plot in a developing area of Athi River. Ideal for building a starter home. Growing infrastructure.

title: Spacious 4-Bedroom Townhouse in Lavington
description: A modern and very spacious 4-bedroom townhouse with a private garden in a secure compound in Lavington. Ideal for a growing family.

reviews.comment: Beautifully maintained home with lovely garden space.

title: Student Accommodation Block in Ruiru
description: A purpose-built student accommodation block with 20 rooms, communal kitchen, and study areas, located near Kenyatta University (Ruiru Campus). High rental income potential.

title: Residential Plot with Views in Tigoni
description: A stunning 0.75-acre residential plot in Tigoni, offering panoramic views of the tea plantations. Perfect for building a luxury country home.

title: Spacious 3-Bedroom Apartment in Kileleshwa
description: A well-appointed 3-bedroom apartment in a prime Kileleshwa location, offering ample living space, modern kitchen, and access to a gym and pool.

title: Half-Acre Plot in Limuru (Agricultural)
description: A fertile half-acre plot in Limuru, ideal for small-scale farming or a hobby farm. Good access to water and existing agricultural activities nearby.

title: Bungalow for Sale in Utawala
description: A well-built 3-bedroom bungalow in Utawala, offering comfortable living with a small private compound. Close to Eastern Bypass for easy commute.

title: Commercial Office Suite in Upper Hill
description: A modern office suite with city views in Upper Hill, suitable for small to medium-sized businesses. Features shared reception, meeting rooms, and ample parking.

title: Farm Land for Sale in Machakos
description: An expansive 15-acre farm land parcel in Machakos County, suitable for large-scale agriculture or a development project. Good access to water and major roads.

title: Affordable 1-Bedroom Apartment in Nairobi West
description: A compact and budget-friendly 1-bedroom apartment in Nairobi West, ideal for singles or young couples. Close to amenities and public transport routes.

reviews.comment: Good price for the location. Ideal for a single person.

title: Prime Beachfront Plot in Watamu
description: An exclusive 0.5-acre beachfront plot in the highly sought-after area of Watamu. Direct access to the beach, perfect for a luxury villa or resort development.

title: Modern 3-Bedroom Apartment in Lavington
description: A stylish and spacious 3-bedroom apartment in a contemporary development in Lavington. Features include en-suite bedrooms, a fitted kitchen, and access to a gym and pool.

reviews.comment: High-quality finishes and great amenities. Very comfortable living.

title: Prime 1/8 Acre Residential Plot in Syokimau
description: A well-located 1/8 acre residential plot in a developed part of Syokimau, ready for immediate development. Close to community amenities and main roads.
